## Description

Wrap message


## Usage

```r
wrap_msg(..., collapse = "")
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |     additional strings and/or elements to pass to cat
`collapse`     |     how to join elements of string (default is no space)
